updates.content: Users are experiencing timeouts when attempting to access the Real-Time API. This incident report is being generated to document the issue and communicate that we are actively investigating the root cause.

The issue seems to be related to Platform Issues on the EU region of the Heroku platform. We are following the issue and will share an update as we have more information.

You can follow the underlying problem on the status page of Heroku as well: https://status.heroku.com/

We confirm that the issue is related to the following Heroku incident: https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2590

We're trying to investigate if we can circumvent the underlying platform issue.
